SRI.S.R.SREEJITH R2 & R3 BY SRI C S HRITHWIK-PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 03.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Bl Oa Crl.MC.No. 4 of 2019 201KERIT 3 ORDER Petition filed under section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioners are the accused in Crime No.653 of 2018 of MThamarassery Police Station registered for the offences under sections 143, 147, 148, 323, 324 and 341 r/w section 149 IPC. The first respondent is the victim. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the trial court may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners and first respondent and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. I have perused the affidavit filed by the first respondent, who has entered appearance through counsel. I am satisfied that the matter has been settled and no public interest is involved in this case. There is no impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioners. In the result, this Crl.M.C is allowed. The proceedings in Crime No.653 of 2018 of Thamarassery Binal a eee Elz 4 te Crl.MC.No. 4 of 2019 201KERIT 4 Police Station are quashed. If any material objects have been produced in this case, the trial court may pass appropriate orders for their disposal.
